content.heading: Annual family cover for worldwide trips up to 31 days - including winter sports cover
content.content:
Enjoy worldwide travel with annual cover for trips up to 31 days - including winter sports cover.

If you or those covered under this policy have a pre-existing medical condition, this policy will not cover any claims in relation to it. If you would like to see if cover is available, you can call us. You may have to pay an additional premium and U K Insurance Limited reserve the right not to extend the policy.

If you, or those covered under this policy are aged 70 years or over, you must call us to pay an annual premium of £75 per person insured aged 70 or over.

[Click here]('https://rbshub-qa.helix.affiniongroup.com/PartnerJump.aspx?partner=RBSTravelInsurancescreening&title=Medical+Screening&data-tracking=Link%2cClick%2cMedical+screening 'Medical Screening') to check if you may need additional cover for any pre existing medical conditions. Alternatively call us on *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)* (minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

Travel Insurance is underwritten by U K Insurance Limited

content.heading: Existing medical conditions

content.content: If you or those covered under this policy have a pre-existing medical condition, this policy will not cover any claims in relation to it. If you would like to see if cover is available, [click here]('https://rbshub-qa.helix.affiniongroup.com/PartnerJump.aspx?partner=RBSTravelInsurancescreening&title=Medical+Screening&data-tracking=Link%2cClick%2cMedical+Screesning 'Medical Screening') to answer a few simple questions. Alternatively you can call us. You may have to pay extra for this or you may find that your condition cannot be covered.

content.heading: UK trips

content.content: These must be pre-booked, for three or more consecutive days.

content.heading: Family protection

content.content: Includes you and your partner, plus any dependent children who must be under 18 at the start date of your journey (or under 23 and in full-time education), living at the home address (or with the other parent), unmarried and not entered into a civil partnership.

content.heading: Over 70s

content.content: If you, or those covered under this policy are aged 70 and over, you must call us each year in order to obtain cover. You will need to pay an annual premium of £75 per person insured aged 70 or over and be medically screened.

content.heading: Emergency medical and dental expenses

content.content: Up to £10 million per insured person for medical and emergency expenses and hospital benefit up to £400 per person. Dental expenses up to £1,000 per insured person.

content.heading: Legal expenses

content.content: Up to £50,000 cover and personal liability up to £2 million per event

content.heading: Baggage cover and personal money

content.content: Up to £1,500 per claim per insured person for personal possessions that are lost, damaged, stole or destroyed while you're on holiday. Cover is limited to £300 per item and £500 overall for valuables.

content.heading: Transport

content.content: Travel delays up to £250 for the first full four hours. Missed connections up to £250 per insured person and missed international departure up to £1,000 per insured person.

content.heading: Cancellation and curtailment

content.content: Up to £5,000 per insured person.

content.heading: Ski pack

content.content: Where you're unable to use your ski pack on advice from a medical adviser, we'll provide up to £150 per insured person per week for your unused prepaid pass, ski school and hire fees which you originally pre-booked in the UK.

content.heading: Piste closures

content.content: We'll pay up to £10 per day for you to travel to alternative sites. If there are no alternative sites available, we'll compensate you up to £30 per person per day if you're unable to ski.

content.heading: Loss or damage, or stolen ski equipment

content.content: Up to £400 per insured person.

content.heading: Hired skis

content.content: If your own ski equipment is damaged, lost or stolen, we'll provide up to £200 per insured person to hire replacement equipment for the remainder of your journey. You're also covered up to £100 towards the cost of hiring replacement equipment necessities if your own ski equipment is delayed in reaching you on your onward journey for at least 12 hours.

content.heading: Avalanche closures

content.content: If, following an avalanche, landslide or landslip, your arrival or departure from the ski resort is delayed and you have extra accommodation costs as a direct result, we'll pay up to £200.

metaData.heading: Need to make a claim? No worries, we'll help

content.content:
To make a travel insurance claim, [click here]('https://rbshub-qa.helix.affiniongroup.com/PartnerJump.aspx?partner=RBSTravelInsuranceclaims&title=Travel+Claim&data-tracking=Link%2cClick%2cRegister+claim 'Travel Claim') to register your claim or call

*[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)*

(Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*). Lines are open 8am-6pm Monday to Friday, and closed Saturday, Sunday and bank holidays. Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

Overseas? If you are overseas and need emergency assistance, call

*[+44 (0)1252 763 659](tel:+441252763659)*

Lines are open 24/7, 365 days a year. Charges may apply and please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

metaData.heading: Here's what other people are asking

content.heading: How do I register for travel insurance?

content.content:
You don't need to register. Cover is provided automatically to the accountholder, their partner and their children - subject to terms and conditions - see the 'Who is covered under my policy' question. If you or those covered under this policy have a pre-existing medical condition, this policy will not cover any claims in relation to it. If you would like to see if cover is available, you can call U K Insurance Limited. You may have to pay an additional premium and U K Insurance Limited reserve the right not to extend the policy.

If you, your partner or the joint account holder is aged 70 and over, you must call us each year in order to obtain cover. You will need to pay an annual premium of £75 per person insured aged 70 or over and be medically screened.

If you wish to call us, please call *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)* (Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*). Lines are open 8am-8pm Monday to Friday and 9am-5pm Saturday and 10am to 5pm Sunday (excluding bank and public holidays). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

content.heading: Where can I find my policy number?

content.content:
If you or your partner are under 70 years old and haven't been medically screened, you can use our generic policy number AP20840119.

If you have been medically screened, purchased an upgrade or an extension (if 70 years old and over), your documents will show the number you need to use.

content.heading: Do I need to take my policy document with me when I go on holiday?

content.content: Your policy document may come in handy if you have to seek medical attention, or have other reasons for which you need to claim - so we would recommend that you take it with you. Please read it before you book a holiday and before you travel, to ensure you understand what cover you're getting and what you need to do in the event of a claim.

content.heading: How can I get a copy of my policy?

content.content:
You can download a copy of your policy using the link below:

[Platinum Account Travel Insurance Policy (PDF, 439KB)]('http://personal.rbs.co.uk/content/dam/rbs_co_uk/currentaccounts/downloads/Reward/Platinum%20Travel%20Insurance%20Policy.pdf')

If you would like a hard copy of the policy, call us on *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)* (Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*). Lines are open 8am-8pm Monday to Friday and 9am-5pm Saturday (excluding bank and public holidays). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

content.heading: Can I add other cover to my policy?

content.content: Yes, you can add business, wedding, golf guests, trip extensions and hazardous activity cover. There's an extra premium for these types of cover. Call us on *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)* (Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*) for more information. Lines are open 8am-8pm Monday to Friday and 9am-5pm Saturday (excluding bank and public holidays). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

content.heading: Who is covered under the policy?

content.content:
Apart from you, the policy also covers your partner and any dependent children. Dependent children must be:

+ Under 18 at the start date of the journey (or under 23 and in full-time education)
+ Living at the home address (or with the other parent)
+ Unmarried and not entered into a civil partnership

You can pay to add guests to the policy, as long as they're travelling with you. Call us on *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)*, (Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*), for more information. Lines are open 8am-8pm Monday to Friday and 9am-5pm Saturday and 10am to 5pm Sunday (excluding bank and public holidays). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

content.heading: Does the policy cover holidays in the UK?

content.content: Yes, these must be pre-booked, for three or more consecutive days.

content.heading: What's the longest holiday that can be covered under the policy?

content.content: The maximum length of trip is 31 days for all holidays, including winter sport holidays. You can request an extension to trip length for an additional cost, ring *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)* (Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*) for a quote. Lines are open 8am-8pm Monday to Friday, 9am-5pm Saturday and 10am-5pm Sunday (excluding bank and public holidays). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

content.heading: Can more than one trip be covered each year?

content.content: Yes, there's no limit on the number of trips that can be covered each year.

content.heading: When can I call to upgrade my cover, make a claim or to get emergency assistance?

content.content:
Number to call: *[0345 609 0456](tel:03456090456)* (Minicom *[0370 600 0856](tel:03706000856)*). Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes.

Times:

+ **For emergency assistance**, lines are open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Call on *[+44 1252 763659](tel:+441252763659)*.

+ **For upgrades and medical screening enquiries**, lines are open 8am-8pm Monday to Friday and 9am-5pm Saturday and 10am to 5pm Sunday (excluding bank and public holidays).

+ **For claims**, lines are open 8am-6pm Monday to Friday, and closed Saturday, Sunday and bank holidays.

content.heading: I'm overseas and need emergency travel assistance, who do I contact?

content.content: If you require emergency travel assistance when you are overseas, you can call us on *[+44 (0)1252 763 659](tel:+441252763659)*. Call charges apply.
